data.pageTitle: Talks and Articles by Michel Murabito
data.pageDescription: Discover a collection of articles and talks by Michel Murabito

metadata.performanceName: Compose GenAI Apps: May the Force Be with Your Data and Models

resources.content:
A very short time ago, in a nearby galaxy (practically here and now), the force that pervades the universe
encountered and connected composable architectures with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Their synergy
promises to revolutionize the development of Gen-AI applications, transforming months of work into just hours.
In this talk, we will explore how modern ML/AI technologies, applied to real-world scenarios, can benefit from a
composable approach to quickly address complex needs with contextualized and updated data. We will discuss the
challenges related to the implementation of these scalable solutions and the crucial role of Platform Engineering
in reducing complexity and accelerating innovation. We will explore how the power of advanced architectures and
platform engineering strategies can radically transform the landscape of “intelligent application” development.

metadata.performanceName: How to turn Cognitive Load into creativity

resources.content: We will dive into the dynamic field of platform engineering, a driving force in reducing cognitive load and increasing developer productivity. Through a series of fascinating case studies, we will explore concrete examples that demonstrate the significant impact of these practices on daily operations. We will place particular emphasis on new tools and technologies, which are at the forefront of this revolution. The talk will also include innovative methods for evaluating the effectiveness of platform engineering, providing concrete strategies to enhance productivity in the workflow. Join us to discover the potential of platform engineering in reshaping the software development landscape.

In this panel discussion we talked about the key takeaways from the event, covering its main content, emerging trends, and notable events. The session provided an in-depth overview of the latest developments in the Kubernetes ecosystem, sharing insights on the most significant presentations and discussions from KubeCon Europe 2024. It was an informative session that highlighted the evolving landscape of Kubernetes and its community.

metadata.performanceName: Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io

resources.content: We will explore how Buildpacks.io can transform the way developers build, deploy, and manage applications in a cloud-native environment. We'll discuss the core concepts of buildpacks, their role in simplifying the build process, and how they enhance developer productivity by automating the creation of production-ready container images. Attendees will gain insights into best practices for integrating Buildpacks.io into their development workflows and see real-world examples of its impact on accelerating application delivery. Join us to discover how Buildpacks.io can empower your cloud-native development journey.

metadata.performanceName: Platform Engineering: DevX nel paese delle meraviglie

resources.content: With the goal of constantly improving the developer experience and increasing the productivity of development teams, Platform Engineering creates toolchains and workflows that enable self-service capabilities, reducing complexity and uncertainty in the software development and deployment phases. Together with Michel Murabito, we will explore the key concepts of Platform Engineering, its benefits, and how

metadata.performanceName: Un Viaggio nell'Universo della Developer Experience

resources.content: In the realm of software development, Developer Experience (DX) is crucial yet often underestimated. DX measures the comfort, productivity, and satisfaction programmers feel when working with tools, libraries, and frameworks. A positive DX leads to increased productivity, improved code quality, and higher talent retention. Join Michel Murabito in his session 'A Journey into the Universe of Developer Experience' to explore how enhancing DX can transform the development process, making it more efficient and enjoyable.

metadata.performanceName: Trasformare il carico cognitivo in creatività

resources.content: We will dive into the dynamic field of platform engineering, a driving force in reducing cognitive load and increasing developer productivity. Through a series of fascinating case studies, we will explore concrete examples that demonstrate the significant impact of these practices on daily operations. We will place particular emphasis on new tools and technologies, which are at the forefront of this revolution. metadata.performanceName: Guida Galattica per Platform Engineer (e non) - The Galactic Guide for Platform Engineers (and others)

resources.content:
In the ever-evolving world of software development, new practices and tools constantly emerge to improve the quality and efficiency of development. In this talk, we will explore the fascinating world of Platform Engineering and Internal Developer Portals, two fundamental components of the modern ecosystem.

We will define the key concepts of these methodologies and tools, and examine how they can revolutionize the software development process. The main goal is to provide a comprehensive overview of these topics, dispelling any doubts about their relevance within the DevOps philosophy and their ability to positively transform the Developer Experience.
